positionDetailsPage.inProgressTitle: This process can take up to 10 minutes.
positionDetailsPage.inProgressDetails: We are consulting the databases to bring you the best candidates for your vacancy. This process takes a little time to ensure we offer you profiles that best fit your company and the job requirements.
positionDetailsPage.inProgressMessage: You can stay here or continue with other tasks. Don't worry, you'll receive a notification when candidates are available.

createPositionPage.howWeEvaluate: How do we evaluate your candidates?
createPositionPage.copyDescriptionPageTitle: Select the position you want to copy the description from
createPositionPage.copyDescriptionPageDescription: We'll show you the description you used before so you can review if it's still useful. If it works for you, just select it and continue. It's that simple!
createPositionPage.noPreviousPositions: You must have at least one position to use this option
createPositionPage.descriptionPhasePageTitle: How do you want to create this vacancy?
createPositionPage.descriptionPhasePageDescription: Choose the option that best suits your process. You can generate the job posting using artificial intelligence, create it manually, or duplicate an existing one.
createPositionPage.softSkillsPhasePageTitle: How do you want to create your cultural fit test?
createPositionPage.softSkillsPhasePageDescription: We know that every culture is unique, which is why we create tailor-made tests. With Tici, the values ​​you assess reflect exactly what your company experiences, without generic formulas or empty templates.
createPositionPage.technicalSkillsPhasePageTitle: How do you want to create your technical test?
createPositionPage.technicalSkillsPhasePageDescription: We know that every company faces unique challenges, so we design technical tests that truly reflect the challenges of the role and area. No generic tests: here you assess what really matters.
createPositionPage.createWithAiDescription: Save time and let AI structure the job opening for you.
createPositionPage.createWithAiSoftSkills: Receive step-by-step guidance to build a test 100% aligned with your organizational culture. We help you identify key values and translate them into a powerful and personalized test.
createPositionPage.createWithAiTechnicalSkills: Tici builds a customized technical test using the job description and cultural fit test as a base. This way, you can evaluate if the person is ready to face the real challenges of your company, without additional effort.
createPositionPage.createWithAiDetails: Our assistant will analyze the position and suggest an optimized description, responsibilities, requirements, and benefits. Just review, adjust, and publish.
createPositionPage.createManuallyDescription: Take full control and build the job opening from scratch.
createPositionPage.createManuallyDetails: Define every detail, from the description to the requirements and benefits. Ideal if you prefer to customize the job opening from the start.
createPositionPage.copyPreviousDescription: Reuse a job opening you already created and adjust it as needed.
createPositionPage.copyPreviousSoftSkills: Already have a previous test? Save time by duplicating it and adjusting it to your new needs. Perfect if you already know what you're looking for and want to maintain consistency.
createPositionPage.copyPreviousTechnicalSkills: Have you created a test before? You can easily reuse and adapt it for a new process. It's fast, maintains consistency, and lets you focus on what's changing.
createPositionPage.copyPreviousDetails: Choose an existing job opening as a base. You can modify it before publishing, saving time and maintaining consistency in your offers.
createPositionPage.saveDraftDescription: Are you sure you don't want to continue editing the job description?
createPositionPage.saveSoftSkillsDraftDescription: Are you sure you don't want to continue editing the assessment of soft skills?
createPositionPage.finalConfirmationMessage: Done! We've now gathered all the information needed to create the job. Click "Preview" to review the details. If everything is correct, you can click "Save". Need to make any changes? Just continue typing and we'll adjust what you need.
createPositionPage.salaryDescriptionStart: Compensation for this role is within the range of
createPositionPage.salaryDescriptionEnd: monthly, based on the candidate's experience and skills.
createPositionPage.salaryNotSpecified: Salary compensation will be shared during the process.
createPositionPage.cancelEditDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel? There are changes that have not been saved.
createPositionPage.selectTemplateTitle: Choose the process that best fits your vacancy
createPositionPage.selectTemplateDescription: Three different paths, but with a single promise: finding the ideal person, without assumptions and with what really matters.

softSkillsInfoSheet.title: Create your soft skills test aligned with your culture
softSkillsInfoSheet.description: Each company understands behaviors differently. Our AI helps you build a test tailored to your job opening and your organization's way of working. Forget about generic tests!
softSkillsInfoSheet.howWeEvaluateTitle: 📋 How do we evaluate your candidates?
softSkillsInfoSheet.howWeEvaluateText:
We analyze each behavior from three complementary approaches:

🟩 Situational: What would they do in a hypothetical scenario?
🟦 Experiential: What have they done in real situations?
🟨 Reflective: How do they think, what did they learn, and how do they act?

This allows us to get to know each person better, beyond their resume.
softSkillsInfoSheet.scoringText:
Each answer is evaluated on a scale from 1 to 5:

No evidence of the behavior
Superficial answer
Demonstrates it with room for improvement
Demonstrates it clearly and solidly
Highly developed and inspires others

We calculate an average per behavior, and then an overall average for the test. This way you can compare candidates more objectively and easily.
softSkillsInfoSheet.aiEvaluationText:
Our AI identifies key signals in the answers such as:
🗣 Collaborative language
🤝 Team recognition
🧘 Conflict resolution
🤓 Reflective capacity

This makes scoring faster, more accurate, and more reliable.
softSkillsInfoSheet.recruiterBenefitsTitle: ✅ What benefits can it bring you as a recruiter?
recruiterBenefitsList: A personalized test aligned with your culture
Less time spent on design and review
Better decisions based on real compatibility
A more professional and modern process for your candidates

onboardingMessage.intro: I'm Tici, your virtual hiring assistant.
onboardingMessage.helpText: I'm here to help you build a well-thought-out, clear, and aligned hiring process for your company's real needs.
helpList: ✅ Write clear job postings aligned with your culture.
✅ Score with fair criteria and no assumptions.
onboardingMessage.noExpert: You don't need to be an expert. I'll guide you step by step.

headers: Process 1 - Senior management and executive roles
rows: We search for the best talent for you
We filter for compatibility with your position
Our AI generates and scores the cultural fit assessment
Manual creation of the technical assessment
Our AI generates and scores the technical assessment
Final interview based on data, not intuition
tooltips: For positions with high responsibility, strategic vision, and proven experience. Ideal if you are looking for leaders with a track record.
A process that mixes efficiency and depth. We use AI to help you filter, but you decide at key moments.
Perfect for roles where you need to hire quickly without losing quality. Everything is designed to optimize time and resources.
